content: On July 24, a fire broke out in the Great Buddha Hall of Shandan County Dafo Temple, which was under repair in Shandan County, Zhangye City, Gansu Province. As of 10:00 a.m. on the 24th, the fire had been extinguished and no casualties were caused. The cause of the fire is under investigation.

On July 25, in Nanjing, Jiangsu, a woman was fined for drinking water in a subway car.
